name: The Battle for Slime King on Slime Mountain
name_original: The Battle for Slime King on Slime Mountain
description:
Battle to the death by eating your fellow slimes. Slime is currency used to upgrade your slime and reach the top as slime king!

Make your slime as strong as you can because it'll go on the database to fight other players!

Developed by:

Rebecca Harrison
Troy D Patterson
Christoph Schoch
PenguinPotential
Sam Lee

Controls:

wasd or arrow keys - movement

space to jump

left click for melee attack, right click to shoot

shooting expends slime so use your attacks carefully!
